headline: Coinbase Is Latest to Join Prediction-Markets Frenzy
summary: Coinbase Global is getting into prediction markets in a bid to become a one-stop exchange for Americans’ trading needs, the latest sign that tech platforms offering wagers on real-world events are finding their way into every corner of Wall Street.

content.title: Coinbase Is Latest to Join Prediction-Markets Frenzy
content.summary: Coinbase Global is getting into prediction markets in a bid to become a one-stop exchange for Americans’ trading needs, the latest sign that tech platforms offering wagers on real-world events are finding their way into every corner of Wall Street.

headline: Coinbase pushes into stock trading, event contracts as retail battle heats up
summary: Coinbase said on Wednesday it will start letting users trade stocks and event contracts tied to real-world outcomes, ​as the exchange expands beyond its crypto roots to compete more directly with ‌rivals.  Investment platforms have been diversifying into different asset classes to encourage customers to trade under one roof, as ‌firms vie for a larger share of retail trading volume.  Coinbase's expansion could help reduce the company's reliance on crypto trading, which has become increasingly competitive due to several new entrants, and push it deeper on to the turf of brokerages such as Robinhood and Interactive Brokers.

content.title: Coinbase pushes into stock trading, event contracts as retail battle heats up
content.summary: Coinbase said on Wednesday it will start letting users trade stocks and event contracts tied to real-world outcomes, ​as the exchange expands beyond its crypto roots to compete more directly with ‌rivals.  Investment platforms have been diversifying into different asset classes to encourage customers to trade under one roof, as ‌firms vie for a larger share of retail trading volume.  Coinbase's expansion could help reduce the company's reliance on crypto trading, which has become increasingly competitive due to several new entrants, and push it deeper on to the turf of brokerages such as Robinhood and Interactive Brokers.

headline: Coinbase Global Wants to Be More Than a Crypto Exchange—Much More

headline: Coinbase rolls out stock trading, prediction markets and more in bid to become the ‘Everything Exchange’
summary: Coinbase is dramatically expanding the assets available to trade on its platform, including novel cryptocurrencies, perpetual futures, stocks and prediction markets, starting with Kalshi.

headline: Coinbase announces stock trading and new Kalshi-based prediction markets
summary: Customers will now be able to trade stocks on the Coinbase platform, and also place bets on a wide range of events through a partnership with prediction market startup Kalshi.

headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Coinbase Has Shifted Amid ETF Competition and New Growth Initiatives
summary: Analysts have inched down their consensus price target for Coinbase Global from $385.27 to $383.46, even as expectations around the company remain mixed. Slightly slower projected revenue growth, shifting competition from low cost bitcoin ETFs and a marginally higher discount rate have all fed into a more cautious stance. Stay tuned to learn how you can better track these subtle shifts in the Coinbase narrative as they emerge. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Coinbase Global shifts by...

headline: Weighing Coinbase After 622% Surge and Expanding Crypto Infrastructure Role
summary: Many investors are asking whether Coinbase Global is a bargain or a bubble at current levels, and what a fair price for the stock might actually be. After a 622.4% gain over the last 3 years, the stock has cooled off recently. It has a 7-day return of -8.9%, a 30-day return of -11.1%, and a 1-year return of -18.9% from its last close of $252.61. Recent headlines have focused on Coinbase expanding its role as a key infrastructure player in the crypto ecosystem, from institutional custody and...
